home.title: Your Journey
tips: Confidence starts with eye contact. Practice holding it for 3 seconds today.
The best conversations start with genuine curiosity. Ask 'why' more.
Your body language speaks before your words. Stand tall, shoulders back.
Rejection is redirection. Every 'no' brings you closer to the right 'yes'.
Listen more than you speak. The most attractive people make others feel heard.
Humor is your superpower. Don't take yourself too seriously.
A genuine compliment can make someone's entire day. Try it.
A no is better than not knowing.
Too late is a missed chance.
'I'll talk to her next time' — you won't.

coach.title: Coach Hank
coach.subtitle: Your AI dating coach
coach.greeting: Hey! I'm Hank, your dating coach. Think of me as that friend who's brutally honest but always has your back. What's on your mind?
coach.limitReached: You've used all your free messages for today. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited coaching!
coach.errorMessage: Sorry, I'm having trouble right now. Try again in a moment.

profile.title: Profile
profile.resetConfirm: Are you sure? This will delete all your progress.

welcome.title: Oh, you downloaded a dating app.
welcome.body:
Not a dating app. THE dating app.
The one that actually teaches you how to not be terrible at this.

Welcome to Charismo. We're about to turn your love life from a dumpster fire into... well, at least a campfire.

socialEnergy.title: Quick question about your natural habitat.
socialEnergy.subtitle: Where do you recharge?
socialEnergy.introvert: My couch, my cat, my Netflix. People are... a lot.
socialEnergy.ambivert: I'm okay in groups but I need alone time to recover.
socialEnergy.extrovert: If there's no party, I AM the party. I collect humans.
socialEnergy.deepIntrovert: I go outside sometimes. When my WiFi is down.
socialEnergy.footnote: No judgment. Okay, a little judgment.

ageGroup.title: How long have you been failing at this?
ageGroup.subtitle: (Kidding. Sort of.)
ageGroup.age_18_24: 18-24 — I still think 'U up?' is a conversation starter.
ageGroup.age_25_34: 25-34 — I've been hurt enough to download this app.
ageGroup.age_35_44: 35-44 — I have a 401k but no one to share it with.
ageGroup.age_45_plus: 45+ — I've got stories. Teach me the new rules.

skillLevel.title: Be honest. No one's watching.
skillLevel.subtitle: (We totally are.)
skillLevel.question: How would you rate your flirting game right now?
skillLevel.beginner: What is flirting? I once waved at a girl and she called security.
skillLevel.intermediate: I can hold a conversation but closing? I'd rather do my taxes.
skillLevel.advanced: I do alright. I've had dates. Some even had second dates.
skillLevel.expert: I'm basically a menace. I just want to level up.
skillLevel.expertNote: Save some for the rest of us

goal.title: Last one. What are you actually here for?
goal.subtitle: (Pick the one that makes you feel the least attacked.)
goal.socialConfidence: I just want to talk to people without my voice cracking.
goal.getDates: I want to actually get dates. Like, real ones. In person.
goal.findPartner: I want to find someone special. Preferably before I'm 80.
goal.socialMagnetism: I want to be the person everyone wants to talk to at the party.
goal.ambitious: Honestly? I want to pick up Victoria's Secret models.
goal.ambitiousNote: Aim for the stars, king. We respect it.

profileReveal.title: Alright, we've profiled you.
profileReveal.subtitle: Don't worry, we only use this power for good. Mostly.
profileReveal.basicsNote: Starting with the fundamentals — trust the process
profileReveal.settingsNote: You can change all of this in settings. We're flexible like that.

products.title: Recommended for you
products.disclaimer: We may earn a commission from purchases made through these links.

habits.title: Habits
habits.subtitle: Build your daily practice
habits.emptySubtitle: Start building daily habits from the chapters you learn
habits.archiveConfirm: Archive this habit? You can restore it later.

graduate.title: Congratulations!
graduate.subtitle: You've completed the journey
graduate.message: You've grown so much. You don't need us anymore — go live your beautiful love story.
